body: Stealth Money is a platform that simplifies buying and saving Bitcoin directly into your self custody, hardware wallets.
Self-custody is a means of holding your Bitcoin in a self-custodial or hardware wallet by which only you have access to your Bitcoin.

Header: Why should I self custody my Bitcoin?
body: Self custody is the most secure way to own bitcoin. It gives you full control of your digital gold.

Header: Where does the Bitcoin I purchase go to?
body: With Stealth Money, you can only buy bitcoin into your self custody or an external wallet address.
A hardware wallet, also known as a cold wallet, is a physical device created solely for offline storage of cryptocurrency private keys.

Header: Does Stealth Money assist in setting up a hardware wallet?
body: Yes, we provide a free 30-minute, one-on-one session to guide you step-by-step in setting up your hardware wallet.
